snippet.title: Rain of Reflections - Demo walkthrough, part 1
snippet.description:
Director Victor Lionhead gives you a run-through of the basics of the world, characters and gameplay in Rain of Reflections: Set Free - out now on PC/Steam! 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/695050/Rain_of_Reflections_Set_Free/

Part 2 can be found here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iZRSaLU2YlE

Please note that the game is fully playable, full screen, no borders, in a standard 16:9 picture format as well - we just had the game set to "21:9 cinematic mode" for this recording.
